:  ~""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""~
:
:.... our previous two servers were busted. they will never come back again.
:     brainlez.ml.org and aindji.ml.org are DOWN for good.
:     we are already working on a new, perhaps more stabile and legal server,
:     so keep on trying www.brainlez.org - it should be out there any minute
:     from now on. http://brainlez.ml.org may also come back temporaly.
:
:.....official site for bC!SafeDEL is opened; www.brainlez.8m.com
:     this will be turned into the official bC!web, incase brainlez.org
:     deal gets delayed too much.
:
:.......................................................updated [07/11/2019]
